tool_description: Identifies and removes duplicate citations from a list based on title, authors, and publication details matching.

raw_citations.description: List of citation texts to deduplicate

match_criteria.description: Fields to compare: title, authors, year, doi

error_messages: Insufficient citations: Provide at least 2 citations for deduplication.
Too many citations: Maximum 1000 citations allowed for processing.
Invalid similarity threshold: Threshold must be between 0.5 and 1.0.
Invalid match criteria: Use combination of [title, authors, year, doi].
usage: Provide raw_citations array and optionally set similarity_threshold and match_criteria. The tool identifies duplicates and returns unique citations.

unique_citations.description: List of unique citations with duplicates removed

duplicate_groups.description: Information about which citations were considered duplicates
